location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Rough sketch map showing the course of sailing race off the coast of Sitrah Island, Bahrein

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pen and ink with additions in pencil on paperDimensions:203 x 330 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Hand drawn rough sketch map produced for sailing race which took place off the coast of Sitrah Island, Bahrein, on the 6th February 1936. The race course shown in red line with location of beacons and buoys marked and shoals labelled. Details of the race provided on folio 3.
